textSplitter.label: Text Splitter
textSplitter.description: Text splitter to use for splitting documents

baseId.label: Base Id
baseId.description: If your table URL looks like: https://airtable.com/app11RobdGoX0YNsC/tblJdmvbrgizbYICO/viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee, app11RovdGoX0YNsC is the base id

tableId.label: Table Id
tableId.description: If your table URL looks like: https://airtable.com/app11RobdGoX0YNsC/tblJdmvbrgizbYICO/viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee, tblJdmvbrgizbYICO is the table id

viewId.label: View Id
viewId.description: If your view URL looks like: https://airtable.com/app11RobdGoX0YNsC/tblJdmvbrgizbYICO/viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee, viw9UrP77Id0CE4ee is the view id

fields.label: Include Only Fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of field names or IDs to include. If empty, then ALL fields are used. Use field IDs if field names contain commas.

returnAll.label: Return All
returnAll.description: If all results should be returned or only up to a given limit

limit.label: Limit
limit.description: Number of results to return. Ignored when Return All is enabled.

metadata.label: Additional Metadata
metadata.description: Additional metadata to be added to the extracted documents

omitMetadataKeys.label: Omit Metadata Keys
omitMetadataKeys.description: Each document loader comes with a default set of metadata keys that are extracted from the document. You can use this field to omit some of the default metadata keys. The value should be a list of keys, seperated by comma. Use * to omit all metadata keys execept the ones you specify in the Additional Metadata field

filterByFormula.label: Filter By Formula
filterByFormula.description: A formula used to filter records. The formula will be evaluated for each record, and if the result is not 0, false, "", NaN, [], or #Error! the record will be included in the response.

url.label: URL
url.description: The URL to fetch data from

headers.label: Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers to include in the request

apifyWebsiteContentCrawler.label: Apify Website Content Crawler
apifyWebsiteContentCrawler.description: Load data from Apify Website Content Crawler

braveSearchApiLoader.label: BraveSearch API Document Loader
braveSearchApiLoader.description: Load and process data from BraveSearch results

waitFor.label: Wait For
waitFor.description: CSS selector to wait for before scraping
